gold.user: Admin user creating a new chain for managing garages.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new chain and returns the chain details.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details of a specific chain.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified chain.

gold.user: Customer looking to view all available garages.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all garages with their details.

gold.user: Customer checking details of a specific garage.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified garage.

gold.user: Admin user adding a new customer to the system.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new customer and returns customer details.
Successfully updates the customer details and returns updated information.

gold.user: Customer adding a new car to their profile.
gold.ideal: Successfully adds a new car and returns car details.

gold.user: Customer retrieving details of their car using VIN.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified car.

gold.user: Admin user checking all scheduled periodic maintenance.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all periodic maintenance records.
